greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; for n >= 1, a(n) = A059897(n, a(n-1)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..256
program: (define (A284567 n) (let loop ((n n) (acc 1)) (if (zero? n) acc (loop (- n 1) (A059897bi acc n))))) ;; For A059897bi see under A059897.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 12 2017
